name: Cobbled Street
description: A narrow, fog-damp street outside The Crooked Pipe. Cobblestones worn smooth by generations of goblin feet.

street_middle.name: Cobbled Street
street_middle.description: A narrow street paved with uneven cobblestones. A battered sign creaks above a doorway to the south, depicting a bent smoking pipe. Gas lamps flicker weakly in the fog.

street_north.name: North End of Cobbled Street
street_north.description: The street narrows here, buildings leaning close overhead. A dead end, blocked by a collapsed cart that no one has bothered to move. Probably for years.

street_west.name: West End of Cobbled Street
street_west.description: The cobblestones give way to mud here. The street continues into darkness, but something about the shadows suggests you shouldn't. Not yet.

worn_cobblestone.name: Worn Cobblestone
worn_cobblestone.description: A loose cobblestone, polished smooth. It would fit in a pocket. It would also fit through a window.

gas_lamp.name: Flickering Gas Lamp
gas_lamp.description: An iron lamp post with a sputtering flame. The light it casts is more suggestion than illumination.

collapsed_cart.name: Collapsed Cart
collapsed_cart.description: A wooden cart, wheels broken, contents long since scavenged. Someone has carved 'GAVE UP' into the side.

mud_puddle.name: Mud Puddle
mud_puddle.description: A puddle of indeterminate depth. Something glints at the bottom. Reaching in would require commitment.
